H0.text: Otis Barton was a pioneer in exploring where. Space

H1.text: Otis Barton was a pioneer in exploring where. Desert

H2.text: Otis Barton was a pioneer in exploring where. Jungle

H3.text: Otis Barton was a pioneer in exploring where. Undersea

A4.text: In 1930 Beebe and Barton were the first humans to reach the deep sea when diving in the Bathysphere, a spherical steel pressure resistant chamber.

A5.text: In 1948, Otis Barton set a new record, diving to a depth of 1,370 m (4,495 ft) in the bathysphere.
